text:
In order to make some webapps behave correctly, behaviour equivalent to the old 
'JkEnvVar' directive is required. Behaviour similar to this exists in the form 
of AJP_* environment variables. However this is entirely undocumented, thus 
this is either a deliberate regression from 2.0 w/ mod_jk to 2.2 w/ 
mod_proxy_ajp, or a documentation bug.
creator: ianabel@mxtelecom.com
rbowen@apache.org
text: Moving docs bugs to docs@httpd.a.o ownership.

creator: covener@gmail.com
text: added info to trunk and 2.2 about AJP_ environment variables turning into request attributes.
